timeline.message:
[WFCORE-4873]: Upgrade JGit to 5.7.0.202003090808-r

 * Adding a new layer to be able to 'remove' git support.
 * Adding bouncycastle dependencies
 * Upgrading jgit
 * Disabling commit signing

Jira: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFCORE-4873

timeline.bodyText: Should these new dependencies be listed in core-feature-pack/common/src/license/core-feature-pack-common-licenses.xml?
timeline.author: jmesnil

timeline.bodyText: Why did you change the copyright year? If that's for a new file, should it be 2020?
timeline.author: jmesnil
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,7 +1,8 @@
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+
 <!--
   ~ JBoss, Home of Professional Open Source.
-  ~ Copyright 2011, Red Hat, Inc., and individual contributors
+  ~ Copyright 2010, Red Hat, Inc., and individual contributors

timeline.bodyText: are 2 these libs still used anywhere else in core?
timeline.author: jmesnil

timeline.message:
[WFCORE-4873]: Upgrade JGit to 5.8.0.202006091008-r

 * Adding a new layer to be able to 'remove' git support.
 * Adding bouncycastle dependencies a nd splitting the modules.
 * Removing jcrafdt jsch and jzlib dependencies.
 * Upgrading jgit and its dependencies.
 * Disabling commit signing.

Jira: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFCORE-4873

[WFCORE-4873]: Upgrade JGit to 5.8.0.202006091008-r

 * Adding a new layer to be able to 'remove' git support.
 * Adding bouncycastle dependencies and splitting the modules.
 * Removing jcraft jsch and jzlib dependencies.
 * Upgrading jgit and its dependency javaewah.
 * Disabling commit signing.

Jira: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFCORE-4873

[WFCORE-4873]: Upgrade JGit to 5.8.0.202006091008-r

 * Adding a new layer to be able to 'remove' git support.
 * Adding bouncycastle dependencies and splitting the modules.
 * Removing jcraft jsch and jzlib dependencies.
 * Upgrading jgit and its dependency JavaEWAH to 1.1.7.
 * Disabling commit signing.

Jira: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFCORE-4873

[WFCORE-4873]: Upgrade JGit to 5.8.0.202006091008-r

 * Adding a new layer to be able to 'remove' git support.
 * Adding bouncycastle dependencies and splitting the modules.
 * Removing jcraft jsch and jzlib dependencies.
 * Upgrading jgit and its dependency JavaEWAH to 1.1.7.
 * Disabling commit signing.

Jira: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFCORE-4873
